DESCRIPTION: Damage scales with Dexterity instead of Strength
Subsequent Paired weapons deal bonus damage.
Damage ignores Block, Curl Up, Sharp Hide, Malleable, and Thorns. NL Does not scale with Strength.
Scales with Strength x2. Cannot play shields.
Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.
